summary: BOTH LENSES HAVE DETACHED FROM THE HEADLIGHTS.  AS A RESULT,  THE HEADLIGHTS BLEW OUT.   *AK   THE RIGHT HEADLIGHT LENS HAD FALLEN OUT ONTO THE HIGHWAY.  THE RAIN STRUCK THE UNPROTECTED HEADLIGHT AND CAUSED IT TO BURN OUT.  THE LEFT LENS WAS ALSO LOOSE BUT DID NOT FALL OUT.  THE DEALER STATED THIS WAS A COMMON PROBLEM.   *SCC     *JB
